channel.title: Lindsey Zurovchak on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Lindsey Zurovchak on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: Deciphering Cassandra’s Prophecy: Preventing the Fall of Your Application
item.description: Cassandra predicted the fall of Troy and no one heeded her warning. Over the years, we’ve learned a lot at Bloomberg about running Apache Cassandra at scale. In this talk, we’ll discuss some of the mistakes we’ve made using Cassandra, how we found and remedied them, and what you can do to avoid them in the future.
